name: Dungeon Escapist
description:
Dungeon Escapist is unusual symbiosis of two game genres presented by arcade and puzzle. The action takes place in a gloomy dungeon where the main hero, Sir Lancevrot, is desperately trying to get out of. There are two gameplay modes:

Arcade

In the arcade mode you have to run away from the ancient evil that Sir Lancevrot has come across while wondering along the dungeon. Get ready for traps, falling platforms, gold, tons of loots, a lot of fun and thrilling experience!

Puzzle

In the puzzle mode you are going to get through various levels, from simple to the highest difficulty ones by using your logic skills and the ability react rapidly to changing environment. This mod will be available in next updates.

Whether Sir Lancevrot will manage to get out from the dungeon or not? Test your skills and find this out!

Quick features:
  • Experimental game mechanic of turn-based arcade game will give you a really challenge and will test your management skills
  • Dungeon Eacapist have endless procedurally generated game level with a lot of traps and tons of loots
  • You can collect different types of loot, which can help you during a game process, or give you a game coins

The game is still under active development. All the errors will be corrected as well as the number of puzzle levels will increase at higher rates!
